game

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Leibniz H. Berihuete Date Started: 6/2/2016 7:05 PM Last Modification: 6/2/2016 7:35 PM Controller class This class contains the controls for the game play. The purpose of this class is to give the ability to change control keys in case the users would like to change the controls through settings

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Constructor Initializes the keys with default values: moveRightKey: RIGHT ARROW KEY moveLeftKey: LEFT ARROW KEY jumpKey: SPACE KEY weaponKey: W KEY shootKey: S KEY
